title: The Man Whoâ€™s Going to Save Your Neighborhood Grocery Store
excerpt: American food supplies are increasingly channeled through a handful of big companies: Amazon, Walmart, FreshDirect, Blue Apron. What do we lose when local supermarkets go under? A lot -- and Kevin Kelley wants to stop that.

title: The $2 Billion Mall Rats
excerpt: The inside story of a black sheep hedge fund, a massive bet that shopping malls would crash, and how they proved Wall Street wrong.

title: The unique culture of Japanese convenience stores - BBC Travel
excerpt: The true star of the Akutagawa Prize-winning novel Convenience Store Woman is the convenience store itself. But what is it that makes these shops so magical?

title: Inside the 20-year decline of Toys R Us
excerpt: Cost cuts, stressed employees, intercompany rivalries, dirty floors, dusty rafters, glitchy IT, fudged metrics: The people who ran the failed toy retailer's stores know what went wrong.
